title: Montolit Masterpiuma Mosakit Pad
features: masterpiuma, montolit, mosaic tile cutter, rubber pad
description: Pad designed to work with score and snap tile cutters for cutting mosaic tile sheets
Pad designed to work with score and snap tile cutters for cutting mosaic tile sheets
Recommended for use with Montolit Masterpiuma
Recommended for use with Montolit Masterpiuma
Can work with up to 14" x 14" mosaic tiles
Can work with up to 14" x 14" mosaic tiles
Ruler guide and 45-degree guide printed for precise cuts
Ruler guide and 45-degree guide printed for precise cuts

Montolit Mosakit is a rubber pad accessory that allows a Masterpiuma score and snap tile cutter to cut mosaic sheets made of porcelain, ceramic, glass as well as mixed mosaic sheets. This rubber pad will turn most tile cutters into a mosaic tile cutter without buying a separate tool. Mosakit is made of vulcanized rubber that will not damage any fragile mosaic sheets.
